answers.text: Read and check your understanding.Examiner:Kelvin, OK. So, Kelvin, I’m going to ask you a few questions. I’d like to ask you about your school. So, what subjects do you like most?Kelvin:I think I like economics most because I can study different kinds of demand and supply theory and I can use it in *the daily life to observe the market. I think that’s very interesting, yeah, and very useful.

value.text: Kelvin’s interested in economics.
Kelvin isn't  interested in economics.

answers.text: Read and check your understanding.Examiner:I see. All right. Well, how about in the future? Are you hoping to go to university?Kelvin:Yeah, sure.Examiner:OK, and what would you like to study there?Kelvin:I think I would like to study something about business. So, I think nowadays we can only make a lot of money by participating in the financial sectors. So, I would like to study something about financial business. I want to get rich, yes.

value.text: Kelvin doesn't want to study physics at university.
Kelvin wants to study physics at university.
